text.headline: Ayush's Career Timeline
text.text: A timeline showcasing Ayush's professional journey, technical expertise, and project highlights.

text.headline:
Web Development Intern
CogniTensor
text.text: Implemented front-end solutions using ReactJS, leveraging React Router DOM for enhanced navigation and experimenting with UI animations using Framer Motion. Proficiency in TypeScript and SASS led to a 20% reduction in CSS codebase.

text.headline:
Trainee-AIML
DRDO
text.text: Conducted a comparative study on real-valued and complex CNNs, demonstrating a 2% accuracy improvement for complex CNNs. Cited 10 research papers and delivered a comprehensive report with benchmarks and visualizations.

text.headline:
Project
Dark Pattern Agent
text.text: Developed a dark pattern detection model using puppeteer.js and JavaScript APIs for web scraping. Fine-tuned advanced LLMs (BERT, RoBERTa) for high-accuracy detection and provided an intuitive interface for end-users.

text.headline:
Project
Orator-AI
text.text: Improved CNN model accuracy from 53% to 63% with architecture refinement and data augmentation. Integrated audio analysis for speech and filler words, correlating emotions with timepoints in videos for deeper insights.

text.headline:
Project
Credit Risk Modeling
text.text: Built a risk assessment model using XGBoost, achieving 81% accuracy after rigorous hyperparameter tuning. Conducted hypothesis testing and multicollinearity checks to optimize feature selection from 50 variables.
